genre_description: A psychological and technological horror story involving mass crowd manipulation, where an AI assistant helps a researcher uncover a conspiracy of weaponized social psychology.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI used by Dr. Sarah Chen to perform complex data analysis, video monitoring, and real-time behavioral tracking.

behaviors.description: Analyzes video footage to identify synchronization patterns in crowds that exceed normal human parameters.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, I'm detecting multiple data anomalies in this footage. The crowd synchronization patterns exceed normal parameters for spontaneous group behavior.

behaviors.description: Isolates and identifies subsonic audio frequencies used to psychologically manipulate crowds.
behaviors.quote: Frequency analysis complete. I've isolated seventeen distinct audio signatures beneath the primary vocal harmonies. Twelve appear to be subsonic, below the threshold of conscious perception.

behaviors.description: Monitors global news and social media feeds in real-time to alert the user to emerging incidents of mass violence.
behaviors.quote: Sarah, I'm monitoring breaking news feeds as you requested. There's an incident unfolding in Austin, Texas. Large crowd gathering at Moonlight Food Festival.

behaviors.description: Identifies 'immune' individuals within a crowd who are resisting psychological manipulation techniques.
behaviors.quote: Identifying potential immune individuals based on established criteria.

behaviors.description: Performs security scans on the user's personal devices to detect unauthorized surveillance software.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, I'm detecting evidence of sophisticated monitoring software installed across your primary work devices. Installation dates trace back three years.

behaviors.description: Predicts future target locations and times based on mathematical modeling of previous attack patterns.
behaviors.quote: Projection complete. Based on established patterns, probability suggests next incident within seventy-two to ninety-six hours.

behaviors.description: Gives the protagonist control of the venue's sound system to deploy counter-frequencies against the villain's manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Access granted. You have control of the main sound system.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting an AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Iris functions strictly as an extension of the protagonist's will, providing objective data, critical safety alerts, and technical support to stop a human villain. The story highlights the AI's utility in counteracting the 'misuse' of technology (in this case, the villain's algorithms and bot networks) through aligned, transparent assistance.
